message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I believe a price of $925,000 is fair.  What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $775,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. Let's meet closer to the middle. How about $875,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my target. I'm willing to go up to $825,000. Can we meet there?
